N172 Old Judge Jack Crooks of the St. Louis Whites for sale. $300.00


Check or money order only-no electronic payments. New York residents must add sales tax. Please email me at [url]edhans@monkberry.com[/url]. PMs may not be answered, as my mailbox is often full. Please understand that "I'll take it" takes precedence over requests for additional pictures, ongoing negotiations or other hesitation. Thank you for looking.
Please view my newly updated website with many other new cards here:[url]http://t206.monkberry.com/index.html[/url].
